item.title: Relevant Coursework
item.description:
Some coursework I have take so far:

Computer Science

Fundamentals of Programming I && II
Computer Systems
Data Structures & Algorithms
Human Computer Interaction
Game Design and Development
Artificial Intelligence Programming
Databases (Winter 2018)
Networking (Winter 2018)
Game Development Studio (Winter 2018)
Machine Learning (Spring 2018)
Intro to Artificial Intelligence (Spring 2018)
Special Topics in Game AI (Spring 2018)
Computational Linguistics (Spring 2018)

Cognitive Science

Neuroscience
Language and the Brain
Genetics and Molecular Biology
Physiology
Cognitive Modelling
